attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details: Fireworks cause nothing but destruction in the hands of general public. There is  accidental fires, arson, estate fires, animals in fear. There is no reason to sell fireworks to the general public. Firework displays should not be held in residential areas.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
